### **Farm Debt Mediation Service (FDMS) Mediation Services for Ontario**
#### **Call for Standing Offers (RFSO)**
[ liste de liens, les documents sommaires ]

The Farm Debt Mediation Service (FDMS), a division of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), seeks to establish a Standing Offer arrangement for the provision of mediation services in Ontario. The Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) notice outlines the requirements and essential criteria for the services.

**Objective:**
The purpose of this RFSO is to select suppliers who will provide mediation services to the FDMS in Ontario. The total budget for the services is estimated to be approximately $480,000.00 over a four-year period, starting from the issue date of the Standing Offer.

**Service Requirements:**
The Standing Offer Contractors will be required to provide mediation services to assist insolvent farmers and their creditors to negotiate settlement arrangements. Services are required from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2027. A maximum of four (4) contractors will be chosen for this RFSO.

**Factors to Consider:**
Applicants must consider several essential factors when presenting their application. These include:

* The applicant must be "engaged in farming for commercial purposes";
* The applicant must be "insolvent" according to the definitions set forth in the Farm Debt Mediation Act;
* There are several types of applications that can be submitted by the farmer, including a review and mediation only, or a Stay of Proceedings, review and mediation.

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing mediation services to assist insolvent farmers and their creditors to negotiate settlement arrangements;
* Preparing an unbiased mediator to assist the farmer and creditors to explore options for the successful resolution of the case;
* Managing the evaluation and assessment process after the completion of the mediation to evaluate participants' satisfaction with the services.

**Important Dates:**
Please note the following important dates and timelines:

* Contract Award: To be dated between April 1, 2023, and March 31, 2027.
* standing offer period: 4 years
* First call-up: April 1, 2023.
* Evaluation and assessment: To be completed at the end of the mediation.

**Supplier Information:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) reserves the right to issue call-ups against the resulting Standing Offers to order the exact level of services desired at any time
